articles.title: Northern Lights illuminate Boston-area skies
articles.description:
The Northern Lights were visible across Boston and New England skies Tuesday night, caused by a geomagnetic storm.

The post Northern Lights illuminate Boston-area skies appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Northern Lights were visible across Boston on November 11 due to a geomagnetic storm.
Residents reported sightings across New England, enhancing local interest in astronomy.
The event encouraged community gatherings and discussions about natural phenomena in the area.

articles.title: As Patriots’ young core grows, Stefon Diggs calls Mike Vrabel a ‘perfect parent’ to guide them
articles.description:
"He's kind of like that perfect parent, tough on you. He knows how to tough love you, that positive reinforcement."

The post As Patriots’ young core grows, Stefon Diggs calls Mike Vrabel a ‘perfect parent’ to guide them appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Stefon Diggs praises Mike Vrabel for his coaching style on November 11, 2025.
Vrabel's approach is seen as beneficial for the Patriots' young players' development.
Boston residents can expect improved team performance as young talent matures under Vrabel's guidance.

articles.title: MIT scores legal win as federal court dismisses appeal in lawsuit claiming campus protests were antisemitic
articles.description:
"Gathering together in groups on campus, disrupting campus tranquility, and impeding travel for many students” is not antisemitic, the court ruled.

The post MIT scores legal win as federal court dismisses appeal in lawsuit claiming campus protests were antisemitic appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Federal court dismissed appeal regarding MIT protests, ruling they were not antisemitic.
Court emphasized that group gatherings and disruptions do not constitute antisemitism.
This ruling may influence future campus protest policies at Boston universities.

articles.title: Pastrnak scores twice, hits 400-goal milestone as Bruins beat Maple Leafs
articles.description:
Pavel Zacha, Hampus Lindholm and Alex Steeves also scored for the Bruins while Jeremy Swayman made 30 saves.

The post Pastrnak scores twice, hits 400-goal milestone as Bruins beat Maple Leafs appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Pastrnak scored two goals, reaching his 400-goal milestone during the game.
Bruins defeated Maple Leafs 4-2, with Zacha and Lindholm also contributing to the score.
Jeremy Swayman made 30 saves, solidifying the Bruins' strong performance for local fans.
